title: Champions/skins/runes missing after long hiatus
body: Hey guys, wondering if this is a known issue or if anyone can point me in the right direction.  I haven't played LoL since sometime in 2012/2013 (played between 2009-2012/13) but opened  the old laptop that I played LoL on and decided to try to get back into it.  Anyways, after my first game i noticed that I was missing pretty much all my champs/skins/runes/rune pages.  I only had 8 champs, 1 page of runes and like 5000 IP right now (I've since purchased Ezreal so I have 9 heroes now and 1200 IP).  Anyone know someone that's had a similar issue or know what I can do about it? I've sent a ticket into riot and am awaiting a reply.  Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Since we're dealing with sensitive personal information when doing account repairs, I won't be able to be of much help on the boards. I do see your ticket still in the account recovery queue, so hold tight and they'll be back with you as soon as they can!
